name: Slither Snake Blast War
description:
An addictive new mobile game that combines the classic game of snake with elements.

In this game you are a snake instead of a blob and the goal is become the biggest and longest slither worm in the game.

A single mistake is enough to make a giant worm turn into nothing and lead to game over, even against the smallest slither, granting this latter a chance of becoming stronger fast without effort.

Do not touch the other snake, move and collect the colored dots, in order to grow and in so doing get the best score and avoid the enemy around you everywhere.

Have fun!
